header.slogan: Elite Real Estate agency in Astana

icons2.content: More than 7000 variants of apartments and houses

icons3.content: English-speaking administrator. Information about any goods and services in Astana

icons4.content3: - Solving legal issues between Tenants and Landlords

icons5.content2: — Culture and social tours around Astana

recomendPage.main_content_part2: More than 30 embassies and international companies have found cozy and safe homes in Astana for their employees with Smart Realtor.
recomendPage.content: Dear Friends, we are happy to welcome you at our Web site! First I would like to introduce myself - my name is Inna, I am a General Director of 'Smart Realtor' company. We have plenty of successful companies in Kazakhstan because very good people live here. Our country is multinational one, we are happy to live here and work. Our company provides services in the sphere of elite real estate. We do understand the importance of accommodation issue of our warmest clients that's why we are creating a real estate company of a new age innovation technologies for real estate search and promotion, high responsibility for our activity - those are the main principles of our work - as well as benevolence and kind human relations with all clients. In this part you can get familiar with our clients' feedbacks as well as to ask me any questions you are interested in. Thank you very much for visiting our website, hope you like it.

servicePage.listHeader: We have the tools, skills and time for those odd jobs you’ve been planning to do.
servicePage.listElem5: Dry-cleaning of carpets and soft furniture

sotrPage.subHeader: ПРИГЛАШАЕМ К СОТРУДНИЧЕСТВУ ВЛАДЕЛЬЦЕВ ЭЛИТНОЙ НЕДВИЖИМОСТИ.

content2.list2: •	Регулярный спрос на объекты элитной недвижимости
content2.list3: •	Наличие долгосрочных контрактов с иностранными компаниями
content2.list4:
•	Анализ рынка и портрет клиента
•	Разработка стратегии для продажи и аренды Вашей недвижимости
content2.list5: •	Автоматическая публикация вашего объявления на самых эффективных площадках в Интернете

sotrPage.content3: Помощь в выборе недвижимости для инвестиций

content4.list1: •	Работа со всеми ведущими застройщиками проектов элитной недвижимости и бизнес-класса
content4.list2: •	Помощь в выборе оптимального объекта для инвестиций – ликвидного и максимально удовлетворяющего требованиям клиента
content4.list3: •	Экспертиза объекта (аналитика по рынку, качество строительства, юридическая безопасность сделки)

sotrPage.planeHeader1: Get instant home estimates and recent sale prices free and quick
